description: Ms. codex. Title from colophon on leaf 251a. Manuscript erroneously foliated beginning on front flyleaf. Record follows erroneous foliation. Physical description: 25 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on tan glazed, laid Arabic paper. Rubrication and catchwords. Mild staining and a few repairs. Origin: Jumādá I 1094 H [May 1683] (leaf 251a).
author: Muḥaqqiq al-Thānī, ʻAlī ibn al-Ḥusayn, 1463 or 1464-1533 or 1534
abstract: Parts 1-2 of a commentary on Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillī's Qawāʻid al-aḥkām fī maʻrifat al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām. Incomplete at beginning; contains Kitāb al-ṭahārah up to Kitāb al-tijārah.
extent: 250 leaves : paper ; 268 x 161 (220 x 103) mm bound to 272 x 163 mm
title: Sharḥ Qawāʻid al-aḥkām.
uniform_title: جامع المقاصد في شرح القواعد. جزء 1-2
creator: محقق الثاني، علي بن الحسين، 1463 or 1464-1533 or 1534
subject: Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillī, al-Ḥasan ibn Yūsuf, 1250-1325—Qawāʻid al-aḥkām fī maʻrifat al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
